snippet: Stan Wawrinka advanced to the semifinals of the Chennai Open with a 6-4, 6-4 win over fifth-seeded Guillermo Garcia-Lopez of Spain Friday....
lead_paragraph: Stan Wawrinka advanced to the semifinals of the Chennai Open with a 6-4, 6-4 win over fifth-seeded Guillermo Garcia-Lopez of Spain Friday.

headline.print_headline: Two-Time Defending Champion Wawrinka in Chennai Semifinals
headline.main: Two-Time Defending Champion Wawrinka in Chennai Semifinals
